trans-unit.source: Instructs Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) to disable the mandatory processing of headers not in the <see cref="P:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageHeaders.UnderstoodHeaders" /> collection that must be understood according to the SOAP 1.1 and 1.2 specifications.
trans-unit.target: SOAP 1.1 및 1.2 사양에 따라 인식되는 <see cref="P:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageHeaders.UnderstoodHeaders" /> 컬렉션에 없는 헤더에 대해 필수 처리를 수행하지 않도록 WCF(Windows Communication Foundation)에 지시합니다.

trans-unit.source: By default the [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] client or service runtime throws an exception when it encounters a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageHeader?displayProperty=nameWithType> in a message for which the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageHeader.MustUnderstand%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property is `true` but the header is not in the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageHeaders.UnderstoodHeaders%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property for the message.
trans-unit.target: 기본적으로 [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] 클라이언트나 서비스 런타임에서는 메시지에 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageHeader?displayProperty=nameWithType> 속성이 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageHeader.MustUnderstand%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>인 `true`가 있지만 헤더가 메시지의 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageHeaders.UnderstoodHeaders%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> 속성에 없는 경우 예외를 throw합니다.

trans-unit.source: To prevent this behavior, use the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MustUnderstandBehavior> and set the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MustUnderstandBehavior.ValidateMustUnderstand%2A> property to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 이러한 동작을 방지하려면 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MustUnderstandBehavior>를 사용하고 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MustUnderstandBehavior.ValidateMustUnderstand%2A> 속성을 `false`로 설정합니다.

trans-unit.source: Typically, this is used in scenarios where the message content is meant to be relayed somewhere else and not processed, such as a router service.
trans-unit.target: 일반적으로 라우터 서비스처럼 메시지 콘텐츠를 다른 위치로 릴레이하지만 처리하지는 않는 시나리오에 사용됩니다.

trans-unit.source: A value that specifies whether to enforce validation of <see langword="mustUnderstand" /> headers.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="mustUnderstand" /> 헤더의 유효성 검사를 실행할지 여부를 지정하는 값입니다.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.MustUnderstandBehavior" /> class using the specified value.
trans-unit.target: 지정된 값을 사용하여 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.MustUnderstandBehavior" /> 클래스의 새 인스턴스를 초기화합니다.

trans-unit.source: Pass `false` as the `validate` parameter to this constructor to prevent an exception from being thrown when the runtime encounters a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageHeader?displayProperty=nameWithType> in a message for which the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageHeader.MustUnderstand%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property is `true` but the header is not in the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageHeaders.UnderstoodHeaders%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property for the message.
trans-unit.target: 런타임에 메시지에서 `false` 속성이 `validate`이지만 메시지의 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageHeader?displayProperty=nameWithType> 속성에 헤더가 없는 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageHeader.MustUnderstand%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>가 발견될 경우 예외가 throw되지 않게 하려면 이 생성자에 `true`를 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageHeaders.UnderstoodHeaders%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> 매개 변수로 전달합니다.

trans-unit.source: The endpoint to which the behavior applies.
The binding parameters for the behavior.
Supports behavior functionality.
Implements <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IEndpointBehavior.AddBindingParameters%2A> to support behavior functionality.
The endpoint to which the behavior applies.
The client runtime to set.

Assigns the value of <see cref="P:System.ServiceModel.Description.MustUnderstandBehavior.ValidateMustUnderstand" /> to the <see cref="P:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ClientRuntime.ValidateMustUnderstand" /> property.
Implements the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IEndpointBehavior.ApplyClientBehavior%2A> method to support behavior functionality.
The endpoint to which the behavior applies.
The dispatcher to set.

Assigns the value of <see cref="P:System.ServiceModel.Description.MustUnderstandBehavior.ValidateMustUnderstand" /> to the <see cref="P:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.DispatchRuntime.ValidateMustUnderstand" /> property.
Implements the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IEndpointBehavior.ApplyDispatchBehavior%2A> to support behavior functionality.
The endpoint to validate.
Supports behavior functionality.
Implements the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IEndpointBehavior.Validate%2A> method to support behavior functionality.
Gets or sets a value that specifies whether to ensure that a header is understood according to the SOAP 1.1 and 1.2 specifications.
trans-unit.target: SOAP 1.1 및 1.2 사양에 따른 헤더 인식 확인 여부를 지정하는 값을 가져오거나 설정합니다.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the header must be correctly processed or a fault is thrown; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 헤더가 올바르게 처리되어야 하며 올바르게 처리되지 않을 경우 오류가 throw되면 <see langword="true" />이고, 그렇지 않으면 <see langword="false" />입니다.

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.

Set the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MustUnderstandBehavior.ValidateMustUnderstand%2A> property to `false` to prevent an exception from being thrown when the runtime encounters a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageHeader?displayProperty=nameWithType> in a message for which the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageHeader.MustUnderstand%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property is `true` but the header is not in the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageHeaders.UnderstoodHeaders%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property for the message.
trans-unit.target: 런타임에 메시지에서 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MustUnderstandBehavior.ValidateMustUnderstand%2A> 속성이 `false`이지만 메시지의 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageHeader?displayProperty=nameWithType> 속성에 헤더가 없는 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageHeader.MustUnderstand%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>가 발견될 경우 예외가 throw되지 않게 하려면 `true` 속성을 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageHeaders.UnderstoodHeaders%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>로 설정합니다.
